debug.name: Debug
debug.hint: Enables extended debug logging and data collection

openDelete.name: Unrestricted dismissal
openDelete.hint: Allows players to dismiss unowned tokens

showDismissLabel.name: Show dismiss button label
showDismissLabel.hint: Show the dismiss icon and label, or just the icon on the sheet header.

error.noGM: There is no GM available for dismiss request.
